children.name:

'cli-kintone-linux record export\n' +
  '\n' +
  'export the records of the specified app\n' +
  '\n' +
  'Options:\n' +
  '      --log-level            The log config level\n' +
  '  [choices: "debug", "info", "warn", "error", "fatal", "none"] [default: "info"]\n' +
  '      --verbose              Set log config level to "debug"           [boolean]\n' +
  '      --version              Show version number                       [boolean]\n' +
  '      --help                 Show help                                 [boolean]\n' +
  '      --base-url             Kintone Base Url\n' +
  '                                 [string] [required] [default: KINTONE_BASE_URL]\n' +
  '  -u, --username             Kintone Username\n' +
  '                                            [string] [default: KINTONE_USERNAME]\n' +
  '  -p, --password             Kintone Password\n' +
  '                                            [string] [default: KINTONE_PASSWORD]\n' +
  "      --api-token            App's API token[array] [default: KINTONE_API_TOKEN]\n" +
  '      --basic-auth-username  Kintone Basic Auth Username\n' +
  '                                 [string] [default: KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME]\n' +
  '      --basic-auth-password  Kintone Basic Auth Password\n' +

  '      --app                  The ID of the app               [string] [required]\n' +
  '      --guest-space-id       The ID of guest space\n' +
  '                                      [string] [default: KINTONE_GUEST_SPACE_ID]\n' +
  '      --attachments-dir      Attachment file directory                  [string]\n' +
  '      --encoding             Character encoding\n' +

  '  -c, --condition            The query string                           [string]\n' +
  '      --order-by             The sort order as a query                  [string]\n' +
  '      --fields               The fields to be exported in comma-separated\n' +
  '                                                                        [string]\n' +
  '      --pfx-file-path        The path to client certificate file        [string]\n' +
  '      --pfx-file-password    The password of client certificate file    [string]\n' +

  '\n' +

    at OurWorld.<anonymous> (/home/runner/work/cli-kintone/cli-kintone/features/step_definitions/common.ts:210:12)
CliKintoneTest-1 Should return the error message when specifying unknown option

expect(received).rejects.toThrow(expected)

Expected substring: "Not enough non-option arguments: got 0, need at least 10"
Received message:   "Command failed: cross-env LC_ALL='en_US' node /home/runner/work/cli-kintone/cli-kintone/cli.js路
cli.js <command>路
Commands:
  cli.js record      import/export the records of the specified app
  cli.js completion  generate completion script路
Options:
  --log-level  The log config level
  [choices: \"debug\", \"info\", \"warn\", \"error\", \"fatal\", \"none\"] [default: \"info\"]
  --verbose    Set log config level to \"debug\"                         [boolean]
  --version    Show version number                                     [boolean]
  --help       Show help                                               [boolean]路
Not enough non-option arguments: got 0, need at least 1
"
should throw error when no commands are passed
